DOC.brief_summary: Document how Swiss GPs allocate their GERD patients to the three GERD patient segments (according to King et al.) and how treated GERD patients are affected by their GERD treatment
DOC.brief_title: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) Segmentation: Document How Swiss General Practitioners (GPs) Allocate Their GERD Patients to the Three GERD Patient Segments
DOC.criteria: Previously diagnosed GERD patients on treatment for at least 2 weeks
